general_advisory: February-March is the ideal time for sowing of Cowpea, Cluster bean, Pumpkin, Cucumber, and Watermelon. Transplanting of vegetables should be done in the afternoon hour to avoid high temperature. Harvesting guidelines for mustard and potato crops. Management practices for various pests including stem borer, sett rot, aphid, little leaf of brinjal, leaf webber, and head borer.
